archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.3.13a: a) determining whether to exit, terminate, renew or renegotiate a contract (e.g. based on whether the impact of any major incident(s) was sufficient to recommend contract exit, or termination, or whether the supplier met contract and evaluation criteria)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
